committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: To add Casco Bay, Maine to the list of estuaries that receive priority consideration under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to give priority consideration to the inclusion of Casco Bay, Maine, in the National Estuary Program.

titles.title: To add Casco Bay, Maine to the list of estuaries that receive priority consideration under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
